value.expression: RPA009 Monthly FHCF Loss Summary - Error: FHCF Loss Summary does not have the listed storm $vActiveStormName$

Hello, 

Error: Combined Storm Email File contains Storm not in FHCF LOSS Summary

The Monthly FHCF Loss Summary (RPA009) bot did not complete successfully due to the fact the storm $vActiveStormName$ was found in the email's Excel file that is not part of the FHCF LOSS Summary file. Please correct the file in N:\LOSSES to have the storm sheets present and resend the email.
